photoeffects: My Colors Off, Vivid, Neutral, Sepia, Black & White, Positive Film, Lighter Skin Tone, Darker Skin Tone, Vivid Blue, Vivid Green, Vivid Red, Custom Color
powersource: Battery Pack NB-6LH, Compact Power Adapter CA-DC10 (included with AC Adapter Kit ACK-DC40)
exposurecompensation: Still Images: ±2 stops in 1/3-stop increments Videos: ±2 stops in 1/3-stop increments (not available during shooting)
shootingcapacity: Approx. 210 shots Approx. 290 shots in ECO Mode
continuousshooting: Normal: Approx. 1.6 shots/sec. (in P mode) Normal: Approx. 10 shots/sec. (in High-speed Burst mode)
other: USB, SD memory card slot; direct connection to Canon SELPHY, PIXMA Photo Printers & PictBridge compatible printers
exposurecontrolmethod: Manual Exposure, Program Shift, Safety Shift, AE Lock
jpegcompressionmode: Still Image: Exif. 2.3 (JPEG) Video: MOV (Image: H.264; Audio: Linear PCM (Monaural))
focusingrange: Normal: 2.0" / 5.08cm - infinity (W), 4.3' / 1.31m - infinity (T) Auto/Manual: 0.0" / 0cm - infinity (W), 4.3' / 1.31m - infinity (T) Macro AF: 0.0' - 1.6' / 0 - 0.48m (W)
whitebalancecontrol: Auto, Daylight, Cloudy, Tungsten, Fluorescent, Fluorescent H, Custom
lcdmonitor: 3.0" TFT Color LCD with wide viewing angle
shutterspeed: 1-1/2000 sec. 15-1/2000 sec. (in Tv and M modes)
videoout: NTSC/PAL (dedicated connector (female) with unified type of digital, audio and video)
audioout: Stereo (dedicated connector (female) with unified type of digital, audio and video)
operatingtemperature: 32 to 104 deg. F / 0 to 40 deg. C
shootingmodes: M, Av, Tv, P, Live View Control, Hybrid Auto, Auto, Creative Shot, SCN, Creative Filters, Movie
builtinflash: Auto, Flash On, Slow Synchro, Flash Off Facial brightness is also evaluated in Face Detect
storagemedia: SD Memory Card, SDHC Memory Card, SDXC Memory Card
fileformat: Design rule for Camera File system, DPOF (Version 1.1) compliant
